text: Nelson Asuquo Effiong (born 1953 in Oron, Akwa Ibom) is a Nigerian politician and senator representing Akwa Ibom South in the Nigerian Senate. He was also an Akwa Ibom State House of Assembly member 1992–2007. In 2015 he was elected into office of the Senate under the People's Democratic Party (Nigeria) and thereafter decamped to APC in 2017. == References == Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:People from Akwa Ibom State Category:Akwa Ibom State politicians Category:Members of the Senate (Nigeria) Category:All Progressives Congress politicians Category:University of Houston alumni Category:Methodist Boys' High School alumni
title: Nelson Effiong
